description: This file defines a custom view class `MovieCardView` for an Android TV application. The view displays a movie poster with rounded corners, a title overlay, and a focus ring that scales and glows when the view is focused. It handles focus change animations and can update its poster color and title text via public methods.

classes.name: MovieCardView
classes.description: A custom FrameLayout subclass optimized for TV, representing a movie poster with focus interactions and styling.

methods.name: setPosterColor
methods.description: Updates the background color of the poster placeholder.

methods.name: setTitleText
methods.description: Sets the title overlay text and updates content description for accessibility.
